subject: List of Provisionally Qualified Bidders for EPC Projects to avoid repetitive examination of biding documents by Technical Divisions
text: "Raty 75y WTHR xifea<ot (Tga5 @Rdev & TTHrf HFTT, YRG FRGSR) National Highways Authority of India 9 Hr44 7qa (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 0fl-5 & 6, 7ez7-10, &RdT, 78 @arit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 [ /Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Procurement/2023 Policy Circular No.9.1.15/2023 dated 21st December , 2023 (Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD / QualifiedBidder/2022 (Comp. No. 149957)) Sub: List of Provisionally   Qualified Bidders for EPC Projects to avoid repetitive examination of biding documents by Technical Divisions reg: Bidder normally submits bids for civil works for different projects. The Technical Capacity & Financial Capacity of the same bidder is being assessed for each project by Technical Divisions which consumes a lot of energy and time 2 In order to avoid repetitive examination of bids, the pre-qualification done in case of EPC projects for which bids were received,  during the from 01.10.2022 to 30.09.2023, have been taken into consideration. The relevant documents were obtained from the concerned Financial Consultants. 3_ Accordingly, lists of provisionally technically qualified bidders for EPC Projects have been prepared and the same are attached at List A and List B with following details: The List A contains Technical Capacity (EPC) upto which a bidder is eligible on the basis of assessment made earlier by Technical Divisions for the bids received during the period from 01.07.2023 to 30.09.2023 (containing technical score of last five years starting from 2018-19 to 2022-23) (ii) The list B contains Technical Capacity (EPC) upto which a bidder is eligible on the basis of assessment made earlier by Technical Divisions for the bids received during the period from 01.10.2022 to 30.06.2023 (containing technical score of last five years starting from 2017-18 to 2021-22). As per Clause 2.2.2.2, technical capacity is determined for the last five years, therefore, for   determining technical score for the current year 2023-24, the technical score of 2017-18 has been excluded. (iii) 4 particular bidder is eligible for the EPC mentioned against its respective name. However , if there is specific eligibility requirement in the project under bidding, the same needs to be evaluated from the bid received. (iv) Both the lists shall remain valid upto 30.06.2024. 4 In view of above, to hasten the process of evaluation, Technical Division may assess the bids without referring to Annex-II, IIl & IV of Appendix-IA of RFP for EPC Projects for the bidders mentioned in List A (Part I) and without referring to Annex Il & IV of Appendix- IA of RFP for EPC Projects for the bidders mentioned at list A (Part Il) and list B, if the Estimated Project Cost of the subject project is less than or equal to the Estimated Project Cost declared in the list of Provisionally Qualified Bidders, and for rest of the criterion, bids shall be assessed by the Technical Divisions as per requirement of the RFP .
